SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.components

Class StartingCardView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.components.StartingCardView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public class StartingCardView extends Object implements Component
Represents the view for displaying starting card faces in a board game. This component displays the front and back sides of a starting card in a formatted manner suitable for the TUI.
